languages.text: {n}Заметив ваш взгляд, Мейв поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}..." {n}Девушка колеблется, прежде чем продолжить.{/n} "Говорят, вы помазанни{mf|к|ца} {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Бога-Императора{/g}. А вы... правда его видели?"
languages.translation_comment: Подходит к РТ (наверное, у Лидзи должна быть фиксированная позиция относительно РТ, чтобы она могла протереть ему ботинки в одном из выборов "Развлеки меня".

traits.locale_text: "М{mf|ой|оя} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, говорят, вы помазанник Бога-Императора. А вы с Ним и правда знакомы? И встречались прямо лицом к лицу?"

languages.translation_comment: Подходит к РТ (наверное, у Лидзи должна быть фиксированная позиция относительно РТ, чтобы она могла протереть ему ботинки в одном из выборов "Развлеки меня".

languages.text: {n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}'s anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"
languages.original_text: {n}Заметив ваш взгляд, Мейв поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}..." {n}Девушка колеблется, прежде чем продолжить.{/n} "Говорят, вы помазанни{mf|к|ца} {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Бога-Императора{/g}. А вы... правда его видели?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the God-Emperor's anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"
{n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the God-Emperor's anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"
"My {mf|lord|lady}, they say you are the God-Emperor's anointed. Are you and He truly acquainted? You have met Him face to face?"
{n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the God-Emperor's anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"

{n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}'s anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"
{n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the God-Emperor's anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"
{n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the God-Emperor's anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"

languages.text: {n}梅芙注意到了你的目光，转向了你。{/n}“来自上界的大人……”{n}她犹豫了片刻，之后继续说道。{/n}“大家都说您是{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}神皇{/g}的神选者，那您……是否亲眼见过祂？”
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}'s anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙注意到了你的目光，转向了你。{/n}“来自上界的大人……”{n}她犹豫了片刻，之后继续说道。{/n}“大家都说您是神皇的神选者，那您……是否亲眼见过祂？”

languages.text: {n}Al notar que la miras, Maive se vuelve hacia ti.{/n} «Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial...». {n}Vacila un instante antes de continuar.{/n} «Dicen que es usted {mf|el elegido|la elegida} del {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Dios Emperador{/g}. ¿De... de verdad lo ha visto?».
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}'s anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Al notar que la miras, Maive se vuelve hacia ti.{/n} «Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial...». {n}Vacila un instante antes de continuar.{/n} «Dicen que es usted {mf|el elegido|la elegida} del Dios Emperador. ¿De... de verdad lo ha visto?».

languages.text: {n}Ona baktığını fark eden Maive sana dönüyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}..." {n}Biraz tereddüt etse de sözlerine devam ediyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Tanrı İmparator{/g}'un kutsanmışı olduğunuzu söylüyorlar. Gerçekten... O'nu gördünüz mü?"
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}'s anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ona baktığını fark eden Maive sana dönüyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}..." {n}Biraz tereddüt etse de sözlerine devam ediyor.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator'un kutsanmışı olduğunuzu söylüyorlar. Gerçekten... O'nu gördünüz mü?"

languages.text: {n}あなたの視線に気づいて、メイヴはあなたの方に向く。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}…」{n}彼女は続けることをためらう。{/n}「あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}神帝陛下{/g}の後継者であると言われていますが、本当に陛下にお会いしたことがあるのですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}'s anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの視線に気づいて、メイヴはあなたの方に向く。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}…」{n}彼女は続けることをためらう。{/n}「あなたは神帝陛下の後継者であると言われていますが、本当に陛下にお会いしたことがあるのですか？」

languages.text: {n}Sentant votre regard posé sur elle, Maive se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie… »{n}Elle hésite avant de continuer.{/n} « On raconte que vous êtes l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Empereur-Dieu{/g}. L'avez-vous... vraiment vu ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}'s anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sentant votre regard posé sur elle, Maive se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie… »{n}Elle hésite avant de continuer.{/n} « On raconte que vous êtes l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur-Dieu. L'avez-vous... vraiment vu ? »

languages.text: {n}Als sie deinen Blick bemerkt, wendet sich Maive dir zu.{/n} "{mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin} ..." {n}Sie zögert, ehe sie fortfährt.{/n} "Es heißt, der {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Gottimperator{/g} habe Euch auserwählt. Habt Ihr ... Ihn wirklich gesehen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your gaze, Maive turns to you.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..." {n}She hesitates before continuing.{/n} "They say you are the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}'s anointed. Have you... truly seen Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als sie deinen Blick bemerkt, wendet sich Maive dir zu.{/n} "{mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin} ..." {n}Sie zögert, ehe sie fortfährt.{/n} "Es heißt, der Gottimperator habe Euch auserwählt. Habt Ihr ... Ihn wirklich gesehen?"
